nodes.text: Starlight Four was the callsign assigned to the fourth pilot of the Rebel Alliance's Starlight Squadron. During the Galactic Civil War, Mart Mattin used this callsign during Operation Starlight where he flew a T-65B X-wing starfighter against Imperial forces.

Starlight Four was a Rebel Alliance callsign, which made its first appearance in Star Wars 11, a comic written by Charles Soule, illustrated by Jan Bazaldua, and published by Marvel Comics on February 3, 2021.
